divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my way to shop-rite in Franklin, i seen some lights that did not belong where they were, i said to my wife, who was in the car with me, are they Halloween lights, they look kinda strange, then suddenly it started moving toward the SE, they were about 35-feet in the air above the stores in the mini mall, 2- outboard lights that were green and a red light in the front...I walked up to a cop and pointed to the lights that seem to just flow in front of us, about 50-feet away, he didn't seem to care, he was to busy making up an accident report...it started to move toward the SE again very slowly i walked as it moved, and keep up with it, i heard what seemed like a humming noise... it stayed over the building as it moved toward the SE, a couple of house wife's were hysterical upon seeing this thing, they asked me what it was, and i said i don't know....I started to wonder did i just see a UFO?? what the hell was that, it was to dark to make out any distinguish marks...the object continuted to move SE toward Ogdensburg n.j.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Franklin
There were no other sightings in Franklin on or around October 25th 2009
Summary: Unknown object over mini mall, hovering and moving very slowly.
